snippet.title: ESPIONAGE: Mafia Evolved — AUGUST 12 (PC & Mobile - New Social Deduction Game)
snippet.description:
ESPIONAGE: Mafia Evolved is a free-to-play social deduction game for PC and mobile devices in which you attempt to find your adversaries hidden amongst the other players. In this game, role-based play rewards those who rely on strategy and their creative instincts.

Official website:
— https://www.playespionage.com

Wishlist now:
— (STEAM) https://store.steampowered.com/app/1174380/ESPIONAGE_Mafia_Evolved/
— (ANDROID) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.AnotherTime.Espionage
— (iOS) https://apps.apple.com/us/app/espionage-mafia-evolved/id1604484995

Join our Discord server for a free and EXCLUSIVE in-game costume!
— https://discord.gg/PfrQG7wdG4

Follow us on social media:
— https://twitter.com/playespionage

Credits/Special Thanks!
— Music: Avith Ortega
— Ruiko Voiceover: erushaVA on Twitter
